description: Rep the brand and the patches of your pursuits with our Men’s Patches Long Sleeve Graphic Tee. Made to inspire adventurers everywhere to keep exoloring, this Men's top combines the natural performance properties of responsibly sourced Merino wool with the durability and fast dry times of recycled polyester. And our seam construction is designed to minimize chafing, while maximizing comfort. If you're looking to keep pushing yourself outside, this is the wool tee to help you do it.
name: Smartwool Patches LS Graphic Tee - Mens
